Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.network.item

Interface INetworkItemManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkItemManager
public interface INetworkItemManager
This is the handler for network items of a network. It stores which player is currently using what network item.

  • Method Details

    • open

      void open(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack, PlayerSlot slot)
      Called when a player opens a network item.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that opened the network item
      stack - the stack that has been opened
      slot - the slot in the players inventory or curio slot, otherwise -1

    • close

      void close(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player)
      Called when the player closes a network item.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that closed the network item

    • getItem

      @Nullable INetworkItem getItem(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player)
      Returns a INetworkItem for a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to get the network item for
      Returns:
      the INetworkItem that corresponds to a player, or null if the player isn't using a network item
